attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paedophiles should not be entitled to work on a self-employed basis.  It is difficult to keep track of their movements and they are liable to offend again given their 'freedom' at work - regulating themselves.

I was alarmed to learn that paedophiles are able to work on a self-employed basis, therefefore not picked up in any of the mandatory checks when working for an employer.

If you care about children, you will sign this petition.
